GeneralInfo.Name: Tv Movie EPG Import++
GeneralInfo.Author: rtv, Scrounger
GeneralInfo.ExtensionDescription:
TV Movie EPG Import++ plugin is a replacement for the Tv Movie EPG Import Plugin (Author: rtv) that comes as part of MediaPortal TvServer. The plugin use the Tv Movie Clickfinder Database to supplying you with EPG data for german TV channels. The Clickfinder Plugin maps this data to your MediaPortal TV channels.
Compared to the original Tv Movie EPG Import plugin, it offers a lot of additional import features.
New Features (Optional):
- Easy enabling EPG grabbing for not mapped channels Calcualte rating from Tv Movie Clickfinder Database and import it into your EPG
- Run an application after the import (e.g. Episodenscanner)
- Import ratings, season- and episodenumbers form your MP-TvSeries into your EPG
- Mark not existing episodes as “Neue Folge:” in EPG describtion (only works if you have enable the download for the whole Series (MP-TvSeries Wiki) in the MP-TvSeries Plugin Configuration Plugin Configuration
- Imports ratings from your MovingPictures and Video databases and mark existing Movie as „Lokal verfügbar“ in EPG Describtion. An integration of MyFilms database will be supported in a feature version.
- Imports addiotional Data that are needed for the MediaPortal Plugin Clickfinder ProgramGuide
GeneralInfo.VersionDescription:
=== Version 1.2.7.0 ===
You must do a manual Import after upgrading to this version !!!
* New Feature: TvSeriesImport is activated -> manual map series (e.g. SeriesName: Star Wars - The Clone Wars, EPGName: StarWars: The Clone Wars)
* fixed issue: table delete
* Bug Fixed: CheckEpisodenscannerImports: TvMovie Highlight is identfy as Series -> series ID
* Bug fixed: Import data for duplicy programs
* Bug fixed: GetTvMovieHighlights - value = NULL
* ClickfinderImport import single TvMovie Bewertungen (Spaß, Action, etc.), added Regie, Actors, Year, Country, Describtion, ShortDescribtion, needsupdate col
GeneralInfo.Location: D:\Projekte\Tv Movie EPG Import++\MPE1\Tv Movie EPG Import++.mpe1

SectionParam.Name: Online Icon
SectionParam.Description: The icon file of the package stored online (jpg,png,bmp)

SectionParam.Name: Configuration file
SectionParam.Description: The file used to configure the extension. If have .exe extension the will be executed If have .dll extension used like MP plugin configuration

SectionParam.Name: Online Screenshots
SectionParam.Description: Online stored screenshot urls separated by ;

SectionParam.Name: Force to uninstall on update
SectionParam.Description: Show dialog and force to uninstall previous version when updating an extension. Should only be disabled if you are using an NSIS/MSI installer.

- Series Fanart path bug fixed

GeneralInfo.Location: D:\Projekte\Tv Movie EPG Import++\MPE1\Tv Movie EPG Import++.mpe1

=== Version 1.2.9.0 ===
* New Feature: TvSeriesImport is activated -> manual mapping series: now you can define more than one seriesname (seperated with | - read wiki for more informations) * GetSeriesInfos: always search in EPG for MP-Tvseries seriesname and then for manual mapped series, if available * CheckEpisodenscannerImports: Seraching for all defined mapped series names.
GeneralInfo.Location: D:\Projekte\Tv Movie EPG Import++\MPE1\Tv Movie EPG Import++.mpe1

=== Version 1.3.2.5 ===
* complete rework of series indification process
* [optional] using thetvdb.com (language de/en) for episodes that are not identified by MP-TvSeries database
* [optional] Load Cover, FanArt amd episode images from thetvdb.com for series taht are identified by the episodescanner (= scheduled recordings / series that are not in your MP-TvSeries database)
GeneralInfo.Location: D:\Projekte\Tv Movie EPG Import++\MPE1\Tv Movie EPG Import++.mpe1
